document_data.name: Beltar Whitewave
document_data.mainbody: '''Beltar Whitewave''' was a [[War Wizard]] of [[Cormyr]] in the midâ€“15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Relationships: He was greatly renowned and respected amongst his peers. He was also the father of [[Amarune Whitewave]].
document_data.History: Beltar Whitewave was slain in an ambush by hire-spell mages brought by [[Sembia]]n smugglers. Afterwards, the smugglers knifed the rest of his family in the middle of the night; Amarune alone escaped.
document_data.Rumors & Legends: The [[Helhondreth]]s and the [[Ilmbright]]s blamed Beltar for the loss of a chest of [[waterstar]]s. After his death, Lady [[Talane]] attested to having manipulated Beltar in some manner during his life, and implied that it may have been the cause of their presumption on his guilt, which in turn may even have been part of the reason why he was slain.{{cite book/Elminster Must Die/MMP|138-139|13}}
